QuestData.Title: Vicious Viziers
QuestData.Description: We can't just skate in, kill Witch Lord Morkurk, and leave.$B$BHis three lieutenants - Vorgorsh, Zulmork, and Cromaug - are all fiercely loyal to Morkurk, and are all respectable mages in their own right.$B$BI suspect that if we attempt to engage the Witch Lord immediately that they will rush to his aid and overwhelm us. We need to take out his lieutenants first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Vizier Vorgorsh, Vizier Zulmork, and Vizier Cromaug.
